member.name: T:dss_sharp.OpenDSS.Lib
member.summary: Lib exposes DSS C-API functions to C#, as well as contains some helper functions.

member.name: T:dss_sharp.OpenDSS.Lib.ConstCharPtrMarshaler
member.summary:
Custom marshaler to avoid the deallocation of Pascal strings
The default Marshaler tries to deallocate the native memory, which is too restrictive, since Pascal uses a different memory allocation model.
Note: we probably should use custom marshalers for every other pointer in future.
Credit: https://stackoverflow.com/a/38677638
